heroTitle: Connecting Global Markets with Indian Excellence
heroSubtitle: Zymptek helps global companies around the world to import cost-effective and high-quality products from India.
aboutText: We assist companies in finding the perfect supplier, negotiating terms and conditions, as well as providing custom clearance and logistic support to exporters. Our expertise ensures smooth international trade operations.

blogPosts.title: The Rise of Indian Exports
blogPosts.excerpt: Explore how Indian exports are gaining prominence in global markets.

blogPosts.title: Navigating Customs Regulations
blogPosts.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to understanding and managing customs regulations.

blogPosts.title: Sustainable Sourcing Practices
blogPosts.excerpt: Learn about sustainable sourcing practices and their impact on global trade.
